<S%G2532><s%> <S%G5347>Festus<s%> <S%G5346>said,<s%> <S%G935>"King<s%> <S%G67>Agrippa,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> all <S%G3956>men<s%> <S%G3588>who<s%> are here <S%G4840>present<s%> with <S%G2254>us,<s%> you <S%G2334>see<s%> <S%G5126>this<s%> <S%G435>man,<s%> <S%G4012>about<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G4128>multitude<s%> of the <S%G2453>Jews<s%> <S%G1793>petitioned<s%> <S%G3427>me,<s%> <S%G5037>both<s%> <S%G1722>at<s%> <S%G2414>Jerusalem<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1759>here,<s%> crying <S%G1916>that<s%> <S%G846>he<s%> <S%G1163>ought<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> to <S%G2198>live<s%> any <S%G3371>longer.<s%>
